external_references.description: Christensen, L.. (2015, December 28). The Evolution of Offensive PowerShell Invocation. Retrieved December 8, 2018.
Warner, J.. (2015, January 6). Inexorable PowerShell – A Red Teamer’s Tale of Overcoming Simple AppLocker Policies. Retrieved December 8, 2018.

objects.description: Monitor for loading and/or execution of artifacts associated with PowerShell specific assemblies, such as System.Management.Automation.dll (especially to unusual process names/locations).(Citation: Sixdub PowerPick Jan 2016)(Citation: SilentBreak Offensive PS Dec 2015) Analytic 1 - Processes loading PowerShell assemblies sourcetype=WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational | search EventCode=7 ImageLoaded IN ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\System.Management.Automation.dll", "C:\\Windows\\System32\\powershell.exe")
